title: Starmer will bring back boring — Scotland won’t be so lucky

title: Kuenssberg: New year, new tactics but old problems for Sunak
description: There is a sense in every nook and cranny of Westminster that changing the mood is almost impossible, given how many things have gone wrong. A view that decline has taken hold is most definitely in fashion. That is what the polls and newspaper columns say - and so, privately, do many MPs.

title: Jeremy Miles says he'll increase spending on education if he becomes Wales' First Minister
